Translation.line5: I bear witness that there is no god but God
Translation.line6: I bear witness that there is no god but God
Translation.line7: I bear witness that Muhammad is the Messenger of God
Translation.line8: I bear witness that Muhammad is the Messenger of God
Translation.line15: There is no god but God

Transliteration.line5: Ashhadu an la ilaha illa Allah
Transliteration.line6: Ashhadu an la ilaha illa Allah

Translation.line3: I bear witness that there is no god but God
Translation.line4: I bear witness that Muhammad is the Messenger of God
Translation.line7: The prayer is ready to begin
Translation.line8: The prayer is ready to begin
Translation.line11: There is no god but God

Transliteration.line3: Ashhadu an la ilaha illa Allah

Transliteration.line1: Allahu laaa ilaaha illaa huwal haiyul qai-yoom;
Transliteration.line2: laa taakhuzuhoo sinatunw wa laa nawm;
Transliteration.line3: lahoo maa fissamaawaati wa maa fil ard;
Transliteration.line4: man zallazee yashfa'u indahooo illaa be iznih;
Transliteration.line5: ya'lamu maa baina aideehim wa maa khalfahum;
Transliteration.line6: wa laa yuheetoona beshai 'immin 'ilmihee illa be maa shaaaa;
Transliteration.line7: wasi'a kursiyyuhus samaa waati wal arda

Translation.line1: Allah! There is no god but He - the Living, the Self-subsisting, Eternal.
Translation.line2: No slumber can seize Him nor Sleep.
Translation.line3: His are all things in the heavens and on earth.
Translation.line4: Who is there that can intercede in His presence except as he permitteth?
Translation.line5: He knoweth what (appeareth to His creatures As) Before or After or Behind them.
Translation.line6: Nor shall they compass aught of His knowledge except as He willeth.
Translation.line7: His throne doth extend over the heavens and on earth,
Translation.line8: and He feeleth no fatigue in guarding and preserving them,
Translation.line9: For He is the Most High, the Supreme (in glory).

Transliteration.line3: wa natawakkalu alaika wa nusni alaikal khair,
Transliteration.line4: wa nashkuruka wala nakfuruka wa nakhla-oo
Transliteration.line6: Allah humma iyyaka na'budu wa laka nusalli wa nasjud;
Transliteration.line7: wa ilaika nas aaa wa nahfizu
Transliteration.line8: wa narju rahma taka wa nakhshaa azaabaka;

Translation.line1: O Allah! We implore You for help
Translation.line2: and beg forgiveness of You and believe in You
Translation.line3: and rely on You and extol You and we are thankful to You and are not ungrateful to You
Translation.line4: and we alienate and forsake those who disobey You.
Translation.line5: O Allah! You alone do we worship and for You do we pray and prostrate;
Translation.line6: and we betake to please You and present ourselves for the service in Your cause
Translation.line7: and we hope for Your mercy
Translation.line9: Undoubtedly, Your torment is going to overtake infidels O Allah!

Transliteration.line4: Ash-hadu an laa ilaaha illallaah wa ash-hadu anna Muhammadan 'abduhu wa rasooluh.
Transliteration.line5: Allaahumma salli 'ala Muhammad wa 'ala aali Muhammad

Translation.line1: All compliments, prayers, and pure words are due to Allah.
Translation.line2: Peace be upon you, O Prophet, and the mercy of Allah and His blessings.
Translation.line3: Peace be upon us and upon the righteous servants of Allah.
Translation.line4: I bear witness that there is no deity but Allah, and I bear witness that Muhammad is His servant and His messenger.
Translation.line5: O Allah, send prayers upon Muhammad and upon the family of Muhammad

Transliteration.line4: Ash-hadu an laa ilaaha illallaah wa ash-hadu anna Muhammadan 'abduhu wa rasooluh.
Transliteration.line5: Allaahumma salli 'ala Muhammad wa 'ala aali Muhammad
Transliteration.line6: kama sallaita 'ala Ibraaheem wa 'ala aali Ibraaheem innaka Hameedun Majeed,
Transliteration.line8: kama baarakta 'ala Ibraaheem wa 'ala aali Ibraaheem innaka Hameedun Majeed.

Translation.line1: All compliments, prayers, and pure words are due to Allah.
Translation.line2: Peace be upon you, O Prophet, and the mercy of Allah and His blessings.
Translation.line3: Peace be upon us and upon the righteous servants of Allah.
Translation.line4: I bear witness that there is no deity but Allah, and I bear witness that Muhammad is His servant and His messenger.
Translation.line5: O Allah, send prayers upon Muhammad and upon the family of Muhammad
Translation.line6: as You sent prayers upon Ibrahim and upon the family of Ibrahim. Indeed, You are Praiseworthy and Glorious.
Translation.line7: O Allah, bless Muhammad and the family of Muhammad
Translation.line8: as You blessed Ibrahim and the family of Ibrahim. Indeed, You are Praiseworthy and Glorious.
